title: ticket-cli argument parsing is too aggressive
description: The ticket-cli.js script's argument parser splits any argument containing a comma into an array. This causes errors when fields like 'title' or 'description' legitimately contain commas. The parser should only split specific fields like 'tags'.
comment: Fixed the argument parser in ticket-cli.js to only split the 'tags' and 'checklist' fields into arrays, preventing errors with other fields that contain commas.
